Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Minnesota in 2007...
Injured on 8/17/2007 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/25/2009 with a Bruised Foot, out for 6 days...
Traded from Minnesota to Tampa Bay on 1/31/2010 (Going to TB: 3B M. Moustakas, P J. Broxton. Going to MIN: RF J. Bruce)...
Had first career hit on 4/30/2010, off Aaron Rakers (BAL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/2010, off David Huff (BOS)...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/8/2019 to a 3-year deal worth $1,659,859 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 5/29/2019...
Released by Chicago (A) on 6/26/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 6/26/2021 to a minor league deal...
